a_standard_user_can: A standard user can access services for the authorised agent.
an_account_owner_can: An account owner can access services for the authorised agent.
an_administrator_can: An administrator can access services for the authorised agent.
if_any_of_the_details: If any of the details we hold about the authorised agent change, an account owner must update the account details. They must do this within 14 days.
is_now_a_standard_user_for: is now a standard user for
is_now_an_account_owner_for: is now an account owner for
they_can_also_bullet_points: view all users who have been added to this account
they_can_also_view_all_users: They can also view all users who have been added to this account.
they_cannot_add_or_remove_users: They cannot add or remove users.
to_tell_them_youve_chanaged_their_role: to tell them you’ve changed their role.
what_a_standard_user_can_do: What a standard user can do
what_an_account_owner_can_do: What an account owner can do
